document_data.mainbody:
altreth was one of many hamlets sprinkled along the Firedrake Road of the Firedrake Shores region of Tethyr.
Valtreth was built along the minor trade route of the Firedrake Road, that hugged the Firedrake Shores, passed through the Dragons Neck Peninsula, and reached the Dragons Head Peninsula. Valtreth was a small collection of cottages notable for its fishing net weavers.
